message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
Alice, $200 is way too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $120.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $170.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $170 is still too much for me. I can offer $140. This is the highest I can go. Let me know if you're willing to work with me.
